original_text: Jesus answered and said unto her, If thou knewest the gift of God, and who it is that saith to thee, Give me to drink; thou wouldest have asked of him, and he would have given thee living water.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 네가 만일 하나님의 선물과 또 네게 물 좀 달라 하는 이가 누구인 줄 알았더라면 네가 그에게 구하였을 것이요 그가 생수를 네게 주었으리라

sentences.original_text: Jesus answered and said unto her
If thou knewest the gift of God
and who it is that saith to thee
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네게 말하는 이가 누구인지 안다면

sentences.original_text: thou wouldest have asked of him
and he would have given thee living water
